messages.message:
Has anyone started getting CMake errors after pulling on latest master?

```Package operations: 0 installs, 1 update, 0 removals

  â€¢ Updating pocketsphinx (5.0.0 -> 5.0.3)

  ChefBuildError

  Backend subprocess exited when trying to invoke build_wheel

  Traceback (most recent call last):
    File "/Users/sayd/Library/Application Support/pypoetry/venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/pyproject_hooks/_in_process/_in_process.py", line 353, in <module>
      main()
    File "/Users/sayd/Library/Application Support/pypoetry/venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/pyproject_hooks/_in_process/_in_process.py", line 335, in main
      json_out['return_val'] = hook(**hook_input['kwargs'])
    File "/Users/sayd/Library/Application Support/pypoetry/venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/pyproject_hooks/_in_process/_in_process.py", line 251, in build_wheel
      return _build_backend().build_wheel(wheel_directory, config_settings,
    File "/var/folders/8p/wkvlnlh91fdcdk4dtztsgbj40000gn/T/tmpaos6t72p/.venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scikit_build_core/build/__init__.py", line 31, in build_wheel
      return _build_wheel_impl(
    File "/var/folders/8p/wkvlnlh91fdcdk4dtztsgbj40000gn/T/tmpaos6t72p/.venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scikit_build_core/build/wheel.py", line 151, in _build_wheel_impl
      cmake = CMake.default_search(version=settings.cmake.version, env=os.environ)
    File "/var/folders/8p/wkvlnlh91fdcdk4dtztsgbj40000gn/T/tmpaos6t72p/.venv/lib/python3.9/site-packages/scikit_build_core/cmake.py", line 63, in default_search
      raise CMakeNotFoundError(msg)
  scikit_build_core.errors.CMakeNotFoundError: Could not find CMake with version >=3.15```
If so, `brew install cmake` fixes it
